thread.title: A $10 Billion Buyback Doesn’t Kill Johnson & Johnson’s Deal Hopes
thread.title_full: A $10 Billion Buyback Doesn’t Kill Johnson & Johnson’s Deal Hopes - WSJ

author: Charley Grant
title: A $10 Billion Buyback Doesn’t Kill Johnson & Johnson’s Deal Hopes
text:
When it comes to capital allocation, Johnson & Johnson can afford to multitask.
It announced a $10 billion share buyback program Tuesday morning before reporting third-quarter revenue of $17.1 billion and adjusted earnings per share of $1.20.
While earnings topped Wall Street expectations, revenue, which was the company’s lowest total... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
